params._governance: The address being proposed as the new governance

NoGovernanceZeroAddress().notice: Throws if trying to set governance to zero address

OnlyGovernance().notice: Throws if the caller of the function is not governance

OnlyPendingGovernance().notice: Throws if the caller of the function is not pendingGovernance

GovernanceProposal(address).notice: Emitted when a new governance is proposed

GovernanceSet(address).notice: Emitted when pendingGovernance accepts to be governance

acceptGovernance().notice: Changes the governance from the current governance to the previously proposed address

setGovernance(address).notice: Proposes a new address to be governance
